title: Bug 23787 [Properties dialog] Project Properties Info page should not use text fields
description: Integration build 09/17. The Project Properties Info page in the Properties dialog is using text fields instead of labels, which looks bad on all motif platforms.
OB: When opening the Project Properties Info page in the Properties dialog, the fields that display information such as Path, Type, etc. are displayed as editable text fields instead of read-only labels.
EB: The fields displaying information such as Path, Type, etc. should be displayed as read-only labels instead of editable text fields. This will improve the visual appearance of the page.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, follow these steps:
1. Select a Project
2. Right-click and choose 'Properties'
3. Navigate to the 'Info' page
4. Observe that the fields displaying information such as Path, Type, etc. are editable text fields instead of read-only labels.
